message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $170. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $170 is a bit too high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $130.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $170 might be a stretch for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $155. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
